title: Jane Fonda
creator_credit: Michael Barnes and British Broadcasting Corporation
brief_description: A documentary about Jane Fonda, her family, social and political activities and her own account of how she came to break with her Hollywood background. Focuses on the contradictions and controversies which she has had to resolve in her private life and in her career as an actress.
